item.title: Notes and gist: Pythonic Programming
item.description: Pythonic Programming PEP20 - The zen of python https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0020/ Tuples Tuple is immutable, list is a mutable. Unpacking a tuple Use * for unpacking for function arguments Sorting functions Lambda functions Short cut function definition, useful for functions used only in one place, frequently passed as parameters to other functions. Also, referred to as callbacks. List comprehensions [x for x in list] It is a python idiom that creates a shortcut for a for loop.
